values:
Hm.

I havent seen Tyler in a month.

Im starting to get use to it though.

I've been hanging out with my parents alot latley..lol yeah I know Im cool.

Sydnie is still one of my clostest friends and she will always be.

Me and Madi are still dating..lol jay kay', but sometimes it feels like we are =/.

I wish I had more friends.

My dad took me driving yesterday for the first time on the highway and I must say I did pretty good =].

11 days until one yr. for me and Tyler =D


Yeah and theres nothing else interesting to say soo..LatER.

<3Stephani

The strands in your eyes 
That color them wonderful
Stop me and steal my breath
Emeralds from mountains
Thrust towards the sky
Never revealing their depth

Tell me that we belong together
Dress it up with the trappings of love
I'll be captivated, 
I'll hang from your lips
Instead of the gallows 
Of heartache that hang from above

I'll be your cryin' shoulder
I'll be love suicide
I'll be better when I'm older

You're my survival
You're my living proof
My love is alive and not dead

Hey there,
I know it's hard to feel like I don't care at all.
Where you are and how you feel.
Put these lights off as these wheels
keep rolling on and on. (and on and on and on...)
Slow things down or speed them up.
You're running now for way too much. (and on and on and on...)
Or you are not gone.

And I can't make it on my own.
(And I can't make it on my own.)
Because my heart is in Ohio.

So cut my wrists and black my eyes.
(Cut my wrists and black my eyes)
So I can fall asleep tonite and die.
Because you kill me.
You know you do, you kill me well.
You like it too, and I can tell.
You never stop until my final breath is gone.

Spare me just three last words.
"I love you" is all she heard.
I'll wait for you, but I can't wait forever.

http://l0vemef0rme-x0.livejournal.com/26534.html

I havent wrote in almost a month.. geesh I'm slacking.

I've just been going to school and practice.
Last time I saw Tyler was at Pioneer Reunion.
I miss him =/.
One more month until our 1 yr. =]...I cant wait!
Hes coming to Thanksgiving with me ..thats prety exciting.
My great grannys bday was yesterday, shes 97..and def. not doing to good.
I made an over all average of 89.4 on my report card...kinda pisses me off bc if I wouldnt have got stuck in ISS for 4 days it would have be alot better.
I dont know when I'll get to see Tyler again until Thanksgiving.
I'm hoping I can this weekend, but I doubt it happens =/.
I still love him the same amount if not more =).
Fall is my favorite season!!
I think I'm going to play soccer.
Im DEF. excited about that =D!
--Ooh what do u get ur boyfriend for ur one yr.??

Yeah wel I godda go mow. Later<3



Stephani KaLyn*
http://l0vemef0rme-x0.livejournal.com/26115.html

I thought Tyler was coming home this weekend, but turns out he cant now bc he has no way of getting back.
I was really happy, but now I feel like total shit again.

My <3 was ripped out, and he has it in the palm of his hand.
He knows he does too. I dont know what to do anymore. I'm not the same person without him here. Hes what puts me in a good mood...and yeah latley I havent had a single one. I'm tired of not being able to kiss him, and I'm tired of crying al the time. All this is fucking bullshit. I need him by my side. I dont know how much longer I can take this. I'm literally hanging by a thread.

Stephani KaLyn*

...lately I havent been happy
and latley I've been mean to everyone...

Im sick of not getting to see Tyler.
This is so fucking gay.
He's the one person that can make me happy.


School is gay, but my grades are pretty good.
Pioneer Reuinion is coming up.. I'm pretty pumped about that.
Yesterday was 10 months for me and Tyler =].

Yeah wel I godda go. Later<3

I miss Tyler.
I got to see him this weeknd.
It just makes me relize how much I really love him.
Sat. is 10 months for us and I dont think I get to see him.
School is gay and I cant wait to get it all over with.


Now I'm guna go eat..its what I do best =].

Later<3

Stephani KaLyn*
http://l0vemef0rme-x0.livejournal.com/25101.html

I'm still miserable.
I miss Tyler so much.
I haft to wait another week to see him if not longer =(.


School starts in like one day. I was ready to go, but not that its here I'm not. I hope it helps me not think about Tyler so much, but with him not being there its guna be weird =/.

I think I'm gunna hit the sack. Laterrrrr<3


.Stephani KaLyn.
http://l0vemef0rme-x0.livejournal.com/25060.html

Today sucked bc I didnt get to c Tyler =(.

I talked to him this morning for like maybe 10 mins. and he gave me his number.
I called him like 4 times and he didnt answer =/.
I HATE THIS.
I'm miserable =(.



.Stephani.
http://l0vemef0rme-x0.livejournal.com/24801.html

Tyler left this morning.
I dont think I've ever cried so hard.


  My heart hurts =(.


If he cheats on me I honestly dont know what I'm going to do.
If he decides he doesnt want a girlfriend I'm guna wish I was dead.


My mom talked to me about it this morning. She makes me feel better.
I think just about everyone talked to me about it today which totally made it worse. Everytime someone would say his name I would start to cry. I love him and I'll always love him..I know it!

Stephani<3
http://l0vemef0rme-x0.livejournal.com/24409.html

So yeah Tylers leaving tom. =(

I'm guna miss em' so much. I just hope we stay close. He does mean alot to me and I dont ever wanna loose him. I dont know whats guna happen with us now. I mean he could easily find another girl or he could cheat on me or he could just decide he wants to be single =/. I just want him to know that I do love him and I'll always love him no matter what. Even if we do brake up for awhile I want to be with him in the end. I think hes guna come ovr tom. morning... meaning I dont need to wear any makeup bc it will al be gone by the time he leaves. My head hurts real bad. GGGggah why cant he be younger =(.

So looong and gooodnight <33

Stephani.

http://l0vemef0rme-x0.livejournal.com/23917.html

mmmm some quotes that express how I feel =]...



-life with u makes perfect
sense ur my best friend<3-

Hey baby im nothin' without you
Yea baby your nothin' without me
We've got it constantly...

-promise me you'll never let me go
and that we will last forever ; please
 its the only thing that i could ever ask
from you. <3-

-well i love to watch u laugh and smile.
oh i love to watch u dream. i love it when 
u take my hand and let me know u believe in me<3-

& where's the good in goodbye?

Its weird bc everythings about to change-LC

...your only the best I've ever had




Tyler-- Your guna be leaving me in 12 days and I think I'm about the saddest I could ever be =/. You dont understand how much you mean to me. I'm seriously so lucky to have you. There are NO words to express how I feel for you. I once thought I was in love turned out to be lust. With you I KNOW that its love. I wouldnt trade you for ANY other guy. You know what to say to make me happy wen I'm sad and you can always make me laugh. I dont know whats guna end up happening with us, but I hope that its all for the best. If I had my choice youd be staying here with me and then wen I graduate we could go to college together, but unfortunatly its not up to me. When I'm with you I have no worries or fears... everything is perfect. I could care less about anything else..you come first ALWAYS. Your more then just my boyfriend you are my bestfriend. And if we dont end up together later on in life just know that I did love you with all of my heart and please dont forget about me. Its like this is it..this is where we find out what the truth is about us. In the end no matter what I want to be with you. I can honestly say I found my one and only. I LOVE YOU<3.
http://l0vemef0rme-x0.livejournal.com/23767.html

I havent wrote in awhile.
Nothing to exciting has been happening.

I've seeing alot more of Sydnie though and I love it.
That girl can make me laugh =].

15 more days until Tyler leaves me. I'm guna be SO bummed =(.
I really do love him...more and more each day. I honestly think we're going to make it. I mean we both want to. Everytime I think about him leaving I get reAlly sad and I mean REALLY sad. Its so depressing. I wake up each morning happy and excited knowing I get to see him that night. Hes the reason I smile. I want to spend everyday of my life with him. 

2adays starts in like a week. I'm so guna die lol.
I'm going running at 5:20 in the morning tom--uuuugh.

My room is almost done =]..yayyy.

Oh and me and Jacie are guna hang out this weekend. I'm so pumped =D.
http://l0vemef0rme-x0.livejournal.com/23542.html

Madi stayed the night last night.

Tyler left today to go to his dads =(.

My moms coming home today from the lake.

I got 4 hrs of sleep last night and I'm still not that sleepy.

I love Tyler more than anyone could ever love him.

Yep and thats about it.


Later Loves,

Stephani KaLyn<3
http://l0vemef0rme-x0.livejournal.com/23057.html

Pretty sure I havent wrote in here in awhile.

Tylers going to some college almost 3 hrs away from here and I'll only get to see him ONCE a week during football season =(. Its going to be VERY depressing for me. I HAFT to see him atleast once a day otherwise i get sad. All I know is that I'm going to be miserable. We are going to try and stay together. He said if we really love eachother we can do it =/..I hope we can. 

Last night Sydnie stayed with me. We went to Heggies house. It=GAY and I shouldnt have gone. The only good part to it was that I got to hang out with Abbey.Britt.Ap.Jess.Gabby. and Sydnie =]. Those girls crack me up.

My mom and brother r leaving tom. to go to the lake. Me and my dad are guna stay home and spend some quality time together..we'll see how well that goes. 

I LOVE TYLER.

Later Hos.

Stephani K.
http://l0vemef0rme-x0.livejournal.com/22904.html

I got back from the lake yesterday.

I had alot of fun. 

I love every minute I'm with Tyler.

I saw alot of snakes...I freaked out once, but Tyler didnt seem to care.

I saw 2 baby racoons and some turtles too.

I rode a seadoo and I tubed.

My lips are swolen bc they got sunburned. They hurt really bad.

I had a bad night last night. =(



I'm guna go now. Later<3
http://l0vemef0rme-x0.livejournal.com/22712.html

I'm leaving tom. to go to Lake Texoma with Tyler. 

I'm excited and yet at the same time pretty nervous bc I dk what to expect.

I still need to pack. We're leaving at 1 tom. and thats wen I usually get up. =/!

Lauren and me are getting married.. woop woop =].

Madis grounded therefore I dont get to tell her goodbye =(.

Me and my dad went walking tonight.. it was acctually kinda fun.

I love my mom.

I seriously hope I get service down there otherwise I'm guna die =x.


I'm gunna miss my computer haha...how sad.


Kay well I'm done. Later Hos.



Stephani KaLyn<3
http://l0vemef0rme-x0.livejournal.com/22417.html

Today is 8 months for me and Tyler or you could say 5 months if you counted the brake up on the day we'd been dating 3 months =/.

I didnt think I was guna get to see him which made me REALLLLY mad, but I ended up getting to see him =). I wish I would have gotten to see him alot longer, but oh well. 

Me and Madi went running tonight.. thats good =D.

Daryn said we could make smores tonight to celebrate me and Tylers 8 months lol.. sucha a sweetie =]. We never did though.. my moms a g-maw.

I love Tyler..hes my everything, but yall already knew that.<3
http://l0vemef0rme-x0.livejournal.com/22096.html

Latley I've been depressed..yes depressed =(. You can somewhat tell from my last entry. I think I about lost all of my friends. I've come to relize I do not have a best friend. My life revolves around Tyler..I hope all this is worth it in the end.


I think I've gotten bigger (as in fatter) so I've been running latley and watching what I eat.

I want to go to vball camp, but I forgot to turn in my paper =/.
http://l0vemef0rme-x0.livejournal.com/21895.html

I hate myself as of now. 

I hate that all I care about is the way I look.
I hate that im CONSTANTLY worrying about my weight and what my body looks like.
I hate that people dont like hanging out with me.
I hate that I'm only happy wen I'm with Tyler.
I hate that I rely on people.
I hate that im stubborn.
I hate the way I look.
I hate that I hate myself.
I hate that I'm not good at anything and that my dad said im a dissapointment.
I hate that I dont try very hard at things.
I hate that Ally feels the way she does.
I hate that I'm at the point to were I would do ANYTHING to loose weight.




If you read this dont feel sorry for me I dont want that. 
I write in this bc its my journal and I write how I feel.
http://l0vemef0rme-x0.livejournal.com/21687.html

hmmm..

Not much to say, BUT.....

I l0ve Tyler the moST
and then Madison =].


Cooper is a TOTAL babe and
Allyson is the most prettiest girl, who diserves the best.<3
http://l0vemef0rme-x0.livejournal.com/21450.html

Wow I havent wrote in a LONG time. Basically I've been without Tyler. He was at Oil Bowl camp which I went and watched today with my dad and madi =]. It was fun and he did good. I acctually somewhat get football now and I like watching it. I missed Tyler SO much it was CRAZY. The way I feel for him is so hard to describe. I've never liked a guy anywhere as near as much as I like Tyler. If I didnt have him in my life well I wouldnt have a life at all bc he IS my life. I would do anything for him and pick him over pretty much anyone. I can tell him things and I know hes not guna go off and tell like stupid girls do. I love being able to kiss him and hug him whenever I want to. I get SO excited when I see him. I hope he means I love you when he says it bc I know I do.

I stayed with Lauren last night and Madi and Jen stayed too. It was fun. We just kinda sat in her room and talkd about everything. Those girls are SO funny and fun to be around. I hope we hang out again soon. =]
http://l0vemef0rme-x0.livejournal.com/20998.html

What a freakin day...

I woke up at like 11:40.

I went swimming, but it was just me and my brother =/.

Me and my mom got in a fight over food lol. Apparently I dont apprieciate things.

I found out Tyler is leaving tom. for his Oil Bowl Football camp and wont be back until like Sat. =(...AND my mom said shes not taking me to see him play..SO hoph. Madis dad will take us.

I didnt get to see Tyler today bc I had to go watch my brother play baseball, but it was hailing and raining REAL hard so we came home early, but Tyler wasnt even home =/.

Daryn stopped by to say hi =].

I saw Tyler for like 2 second and all I got was ONE kiss =/.



I'm gunna miss him SO much =(. He's my everything and everything revolves around him so its gunna be weird without him for a few days. I'll get to spend more time with Madi though =). But I just hate knowing I'm not guna get to c him. This will be the longest we've ever gone without getting to see eachother.

Oh well its sleeping weather so thats what I'm guna go do.

Later<3

Stephani.
http://l0vemef0rme-x0.livejournal.com/20774.html

Today me and Madi got up like at 12. Then we layed around because we're lazy asses..Ha =]. After that we fixed us some lunch and then went swimming!  Me and Madi decided to take a shower together with r bathing-suits on lol..arent we cool?! Like right wen I got out of the shower Tyler calls and says "are you ready"..yeah I wasnt even close and he was 5 minutes away =x. He ended up having to wait on me lol ..oh wel..it takes time for perfection lol...yeah that was a joke =/. Tyler came over for a little bit..I love being with him. I acctually had fun just because I was with him =]. His mom asked me to go to the lake with them on the 4th of July..that aught to be fun =). I guess I'm guna go watch some tv. or something.  Later Loves<3

Stephani KaLyn*
http://l0vemef0rme-x0.livejournal.com/20607.html

Not alot has been happening latley other than usual.

Madi came back today =]
I went swimming.
I got to see Tyler.
I got something finally off my chest.


I talked to JOssy alot last night.. sucha a sweet<3.

I love Tyler GolLLEeeeeee.. he is def. my one and only and my entire WORLD. I hope we are together forever..yes FOrEVer =]. mmmmmmmmm...<333

Oh yes and I love Sydnie StEEl. I'll always be here for you..=]. You know better than to trust ANY bitch..!

And ALLYSON is sooo BeAUTiFUL.. The hawtest girl I've ever seen. Thanks for everything. You'll always be kickass.. I love you.
http://l0vemef0rme-x0.livejournal.com/20321.html

Last night I stayed with Madison. It was fun =). Shes leaving Sun. morning and wont be back until Thursday =/. I'm going to miss her. 

Tyler and me got to hang out like the whole night basically. well up until almost 1. We watched The Boogeyman..its way scary =I. I love him SO much. =).

Well I guess I'm guna go to sleep bc theres nothing else for me to do. 


Goodnite.


Stephani KaLyn Willis

oh GOSH. Not a DAMN thing has happend latley. Same ol' boring shit just a different day =/. Tyler makes me SO happy =]. OMG Sydnie pulled a joke/lie on me walla go. She had me in tears.. I dont think I've ever been so shocked and scared in my life. I'm talking to Ally..gollee I'm so glad I have her in my life. Shes so sweet<3.

http://l0vemef0rme-x0.livejournal.com/17040.html

No words can describe love, or the way that one person makes you feel.
It's when they call you, when your heart skips that beat, and you want to know how their day went.
When you hear their footsteps walking to your door, and you realize that everytime you hear that, you smile.
It's when you are sitting in a room with them, and when they get up to leave, you can just feel the absence of someone.
It's when you can just sit in the car for an hour or so, with just silence, and KNOW that everything is perfect.
Whether one night you go to the movies and dinner, or stay at home in your pj's and just talk, spending time with them is the one thing in life you look forward to.
It's when you get in a fight, you always make things right before you go to sleep. Because if you don't , than you won't be able to sleep.
It's when you realize the arguments in the relationship, make it stronger, and after you fight.. you just want to hold them.
Whenever you can brag about them to your friends, even though you know they don't want to hear what you have to say, but you HAVE to tell someone how you feel.
When the small things you do for each other, are the ones that make you smile, laugh, and cry.. all at the same time.
When they call you at the most inoppurtune time, but it makes you feel good because you know they are thinking about you.
Just seeing them can make your day, and just hearing them can make you smile.
When they treat you the same way around their friends, as if they would when you are alone, not because they feel obligated to.. but because they want to.
When you want to know more about them .. always.
They aren't just someone you are falling hopelessly in love for, they are your best friend.
Someone you can tell everything to, and they can respond with honest feelings.
Love is something that touches everyone.. and puts an impression on each person in a different way.
There is no definition to love, because everyone loves in different ways.

I Want A Boy...

who can wrestle with me & let me win, 
who I can talk to about anything, 
who laughs at my jokes,
a boy who puts my cold hands in his warm hoodie pockets, 
who lets me use his sweatshirt for a pillow,
who buys me 25 cent rings and sticky hands,
who says i love you & means it,
who will kiss me in the rain, in the sunshine & in the snow,
who calls unexpectedly at random times,
a boy who voice cracks sometimes & laughs it off,
who will have many inside jokes with me & remember each one,
a boy who i can be myself around & so can he
who realizes that girls say things but don't mean them,
who I can go swimming with on hot days,
who can tell me his problems & let me help,
who will listen to me talk about the new nail polish I got,
who will bring me seashells from the beach,
who will let me beat him up when I get angry,
who writes love letters to me but doesn't send them,
who saves his genuine, big smiles for me,
a boy with deep eyes that can see through faces into depths,
who wears baseball hats & lets me wear his too,
who gives me his t-shirt to change into & not expect to get it back,
who knows my favorite stuff
who will call me by my full name... first, middle & last.
a boy who will kiss me & tell me I'm pretty,
who will let me cry to him,
who will squeeze my hips just right from behind,
who surprises me,
who compliments my manicure & plays with my hair,
who knows when I have a math test or when I fail one.
a boy who smells like he just stepped out of the shower.
who wears cologne that I can subtly smell when leaning on his shoulder,
who tells me I have a nice laugh & a smile that lights up the room & simply be mine to hold.
